examples.korean: We talked quietly so as not to be overheard. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 혹시나 남이 듣지 않도록 조용히 말을 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We talked quietly so as not to be overheard. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I didn’t think you’d be at home but I just called by on the off chance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 네가 집에 있으리라고는 생각 안 하고 그냥 혹시나 해서 들러 본 거야. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I didn’t think you’d be at home but I just called by on the off chance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: In case you forgot, remember that the consequences of a delay would be devastating for the company. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혹시나 잊으셨는지 모르겠지만, 지연에 따른 결과가 회사에는 치명적일 수 있음을 염두에 두십시오. DARAKWON
examples.english: In case you forgot, remember that the consequences of a delay would be devastating for the company. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As a reminder, another beta test has to be performed before the official test run in front of the client. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혹시나 해서 말씀드리지만, 고객 앞에서 정식 시험 운전을 하기 전에 베타 테스트를 한 번 더 시행해야 합니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: As a reminder, another beta test has to be performed before the official test run in front of the client. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I wondered if it was you, and it was. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 혹시나 했는데 역시 당신이었군요 Neungyule
examples.english: I wondered if it was you, and it was. Add to Wordbook
